Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Controller Class This class is the core of the game logic
    MoveParser
    MoveParser This singleton class is used to extract from JSON file all questions that a player can do to the server and all answers that the server can give.
    TestChangeDieValue
    Value Changer Tester This class tests if a die correctly changes his value
    TestCheckDieDecrement
    DieReduceChecker Tester This class tests if a die correctly reduces his value
    TestCheckDieEnhance
    Die Turner Tester This class tests if a die correctly increase his value
    TestChooseCheckChecker
    Choose Check Checker Tester This class tests if the function chooses the correct check checker
    TestChooseDieModifier
    Chose Die Tester This class tests if a die is correctly chosen for a modification
    TestDieEnhancer
    Die Enhancer Tester This class tests if a die correctly increase his value
    TestDieMover
    Die Mover Tester This class tests if a die is correctly moved into the grid
    TestDieReducer
    Die Reducer Tester This class tests if the function correctly reduces the value of a die
    TestMoveParser
    MoveParser Test Class This method verifies the correct functioning of the MoveParser
    TestRollDie
    Die Roller Tester This class tests if a die correctly rolls his value
    TestTurnTheOpposite
    Die Turner Tester This class tests if a die correctly turns on the other side
